pages.text: The most basic and simple alchemical device.$(br)Developed by Zardius, it uses an alchemical crucible that processes materials with liquids.$(br2)Mainly used to extract alchemical aspects.

pages.title: How to Assemble the Device
pages.text: Made by embedding tourmaline into an iron crucible using several pieces of iron and tourmaline as raw materials.$(br2)Detailed steps are as follows.

pages.title: How to Use the Device
pages.text: Place a heat source directly beneath the alchemical crucible, then add the necessary liquid, materials for production, and an appropriate amount of mana or alchemical aspect for the desired product.$(br)Maintain a boiling state for several seconds to minutes to obtain the result.$(br2)If liquid remains, the product will float on the surface, so use a collection tool to gather it.$(br2)Excess energy input may cause an explosion.
